review: I use this product to watch movies - not a gamer or a user in need of the most powerful products. In an earlier review, I complained that the content repeatedly needed buffering, and I got a message on screen telling me my Wifi connection is too slow. I have since been able to make this work with no issues by ensuring I have all other wifi devices (computers, phone, etc) turned off. (The other choice obviously would be to order a more powerful connection from my broadband provider. Either way, the experience has been excellent.) I have watched a dozen or so movies in the comfort of my home using the Fire Stick. Couldn't be happier.
author: fswan

review: I already own an Amazon Fire TV (love it!) and decided to get the Fire TV Stick for other rooms in the house. It was a breeze to install and just as easy to use as the Fire TV. I downloaded the remote control app which works very well with the system. I highly recommend the Fire TV Stick!

review: This is a FUN new toy.  I love my techie toys.  It really makes finding free Prime programming easy.  It's also a great way to find entire an season of a series.There are game apps available, too. I like being able to do the games and use internet sites on the large screen.  The stick is pretty much plug and play.  I used the short extension USB cable enclosed. Just be sure to follow the enclosed instructions.
